message.raw:
* switched UniformGravity to Gravity.
  * added DiscreteForces.
  * Use DiscreteForces to implement SimbodyLink::SetForce and SimbodyHingeJoint::SetForce.
  * Implement SimbodyLink::GetWorldCoGLinearVel, SimbodyLink::GetWorldLinearVel(_offset),  and SimbodyLink::GetWorldAngularVel.
  * Implement SimbodyHingeJoint::GetVelocity.
  * added comments phyics.cc, added getcahr for debugging.  changed inelastic collision test validation integration from implicit euler to trapezoid (exact solution), ODE will break.  Added comments for simulating inelastic collision.

message:
* switched UniformGravity to Gravity.
  * added DiscreteForces.
  * Use DiscreteForces to implement SimbodyLink::SetForce and SimbodyHingeJoint::SetForce.
  * Implement SimbodyLink::GetWorldCoGLinearVel, SimbodyLink::GetWorldLinearVel(_offset),  and SimbodyLink::GetWorldAngularVel.
  * Implement SimbodyHingeJoint::GetVelocity.
  * added comments phyics.cc, added getcahr for debugging.  changed inelastic collision test validation integration from implicit euler to trapezoid (exact solution), ODE will break.  Added comments for simulating inelastic collision.
